ygData.subject: RE: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: The honey jum is for a cleric/paladin quest in Qeynos.  The result of the quest is the Shinging Star of Light (a mace 6 28 that cast clense).  You must have
ygData.messageBody:
The honey jum is for a cleric/paladin quest in Qeynos. The result of the
quest is the Shinging Star of Light (a mace 6 28 that cast clense). You
must have high faction with the Priest of Life to do this quest, which is a
pain cause there is only a few things you can do to raise the faction. The
mace itself is worth around 20 pp or so and involves some running around
between WK and Qeynos.



> Honeycombs are found off of Bixies and Bixie Drones. These
> little guys are
> prolly like lvl 2 -4 ...certainly none that I can remember higher than
> 5....I was collecting them last week and selling them for one plat
> each...made a bundle of $$ that way (wee at least for a lvl 8 character :)
> they are used for making Honeyjum....and , I think for another quest...but
> after selling a bunch of the honeycomb I began wondering why it was so
> valuable...and I STILL don't understand why people are paying such an
> outrageous amount of $$ for it!!
> Anybody know the answer to this puzzle>>????
> Sean
